*div1 type="summary"* *p*Austin to Mary Austin Holley, January 30, 1832. Introducing José Maria Carbajal. Mexicans of Bexar uniformly friendly to Austin. */p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe de Austin*/location_mentioned*, *date_mentioned n="01-30-1832">Jan: 30,1832*/date_mentioned**/p* *p*As you will be entertained by hearing all you can of our *location_mentioned*Texas */location_mentioned*I will give a short note to my friend *person_mentioned*Jose Carbajal*/person_mentioned* who has promised to deliver it in person. He is a *person_mentioned*native Mexican,*/person_mentioned* was born at *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned* where his *person_mentioned*Mother */person_mentioned*and *person_mentioned*family */person_mentioned*live. In *date_mentioned n="xx-xx-1823">1823*/date_mentioned* he went to *location_mentioned*Lexington, K,*/location_mentioned* with *person_mentioned*Mr Littlebury Hawkins*/person_mentioned*, and was educated by *person_mentioned*Mr. Campbel of *location_mentioned*Bethany, Virginia*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*, near *location_mentioned*Wheeling*/location_mentioned*. He is a sprightly, intelligent youth, and his principles are very sound and honorable. His own *person_mentioned*countrymen */person_mentioned*call him a *person_mentioned*Norte Americano*/person_mentioned*. The *person_mentioned*people of *location_mentioned*Bexar*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned* are pretty unanimously my *person_mentioned*friends*/person_mentioned*, and the friends of all the *person_mentioned*Colonists of *location_mentioned*Texas*/location_mentioned**/person_mentioned*. *person_mentioned*Carbajal */person_mentioned*is rather enthusiastic, the fault of youth, but you can get some information from him that may amuse you.*/p*
*p*There is nothing new since you left of much importance except a report that *person_mentioned*Gen. Teran*/person_mentioned* is to be on in *date_mentioned n="03-xx-1832">March */date_mentioned*with *person_mentioned*3000 men*/person_mentioned* to fit out a campaign against the *person_mentioned*Comanche Indians*/person_mentioned*. So says rumour, but I place little confidence in it, for that number of *person_mentioned*troops */person_mentioned*could not be collected so soon*/p*. *p*I leave for *location_mentioned*Saltillo */location_mentioned*in *date_mentioned n="02-05-1832">fifteen days*/date_mentioned*. My health is so so.*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Estevan*/person_mentioned*.*/p*
*/div1*
